adDetails: Aziz Abbatiello azizfinewoodworking.com From fine art to repairs, I can do it all, from A-Z. Arbors, Beds, Cabinets, Desks, Exotic woods, French polish, Greene and Greene craftsman, Headboards, Imaginative designs, Jams, Kitchens counters, Lamination, Mobiles, Newel posts, Open studios, Porches, Queen Anne style, Racks, Sideboards, Tables, Useful art furniture, Veneer hand cut, Wine racks, Xylophones (well, marimbas, but let's run with it...), Yew wood bow, and Zebra wood ...whatever you want! A-Z woodworking. wood worker with full wood shop can mill custom trim package in any wood you like and install. Fine finish carpenter I build and install doors, windows, and stairs. High end decks, fences, gates and landscape wood art hardwood floors and craftsmen built-in furniture. Send me your ideas I will work with you to create them Please include phone number with your reply Thank you
